org.apache.flink.runtime.jobgraph.tasks

接口 StatefulTask<T extends StateHandle<?>>


  • public interface StatefulTask<T extends StateHandle<?>>
    This interface must be implemented by any invokable that has recoverable state and participates in checkpointing.

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void abortCheckpointOnBarrier(long checkpointId, Throwable cause)
      Aborts a checkpoint as the result of receiving possibly some checkpoint barriers, but at least one CancelCheckpointMarker.
      void notifyCheckpointComplete(long checkpointId)
      Invoked when a checkpoint has been completed, i.e., when the checkpoint coordinator has received the notification from all participating tasks.
      void setInitialState(T stateHandle)
      Sets the initial state of the operator, upon recovery.
      boolean triggerCheckpoint(long checkpointId, long timestamp)
      This method is either called directly and asynchronously by the checkpoint coordinator (in the case of functions that are directly notified - usually the data sources), or called synchronously when all incoming channels have reported a checkpoint barrier.
      void triggerCheckpointOnBarrier(long checkpointId, long timestamp)
      This method is called when a checkpoint is triggered as a result of receiving checkpoint barriers on all input streams.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setInitialState

        void setInitialState(T stateHandle)
              throws Exception
        Sets the initial state of the operator, upon recovery. The initial state is typically a snapshot of the state from a previous execution.
        参数:
        stateHandle - The handle to the state.
        抛出:
        Exception

      • triggerCheckpoint

        boolean triggerCheckpoint(long checkpointId,
                          long timestamp)
                   throws Exception
        This method is either called directly and asynchronously by the checkpoint coordinator (in the case of functions that are directly notified - usually the data sources), or called synchronously when all incoming channels have reported a checkpoint barrier.
        参数:
        checkpointId - The ID of the checkpoint, incrementing.
        timestamp - The timestamp when the checkpoint was triggered at the JobManager.
        返回:
        false if the checkpoint can not be carried out, true otherwise
        抛出:
        Exception

      • triggerCheckpointOnBarrier

        void triggerCheckpointOnBarrier(long checkpointId,
                                long timestamp)
                         throws Exception
        This method is called when a checkpoint is triggered as a result of receiving checkpoint barriers on all input streams.
        参数:
        checkpointId - The ID of the checkpoint, incrementing.
        timestamp - The timestamp when the checkpoint was triggered at the JobManager.
        抛出:
        Exception - Exceptions thrown as the result of triggering a checkpoint are forwarded.

      • abortCheckpointOnBarrier

        void abortCheckpointOnBarrier(long checkpointId,
                              Throwable cause)
                       throws Exception
        Aborts a checkpoint as the result of receiving possibly some checkpoint barriers, but at least one CancelCheckpointMarker.

        This requires implementing tasks to forward a CancelCheckpointMarker to their outputs.

        参数:
        checkpointId - The ID of the checkpoint to be aborted.
        cause - The reason why the checkpoint was aborted during alignment
        抛出:
        Exception

      • notifyCheckpointComplete

        void notifyCheckpointComplete(long checkpointId)
                       throws Exception
        Invoked when a checkpoint has been completed, i.e., when the checkpoint coordinator has received the notification from all participating tasks.
        参数:
        checkpointId - The ID of the checkpoint that is complete..
        抛出:
        Exception - The notification method may forward its exceptions.
